text: geuga hananim-e daehayeo geojis mal handago geudeul-i malhaneunyo hana nimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun-eun geudaeui ma-eum-eul bonghayeo beolyeoss-eulila geuli go hananim-eun geu geojis-eul jegeohago geubun-ui malsseum-eulo jinlileul ibjeunghasyeoss eulila sillo hananim-eun ma-eum-ui bi mil-eul asigo gyesinola
